document_data.mainbody:
Scaroth was a lich from the world of Oerth and one of the opponents of the hero Scaldulin.
Sages of Toril knew about some of Scaldulins feats and heroics on a distant world of Greyhawk, including the heros stand against the dreaded lich Scaroth the Warped. Scaldulin used his powerful enchanted sword Hoarfrost Blade to slice the lichs hand and defeating the undead creature.
